resources.string: Keep calm. Our specialists are already going to you!
Take a look at the presentation about them:
I have CoronaVirus! I am gonna die very soon. Here is my will

I, ___, resident in the City of ___, Country of ___, State of ___, \ being of sound ming, not acting under durres or undue influence and fully understanding the \ nature and extent of all my property and of this disposition thereof, do hereby make, publish \ and declare this document to be my Last Will and Testament, and hereby revoke and all other \ wills and codicils heretofore made by me.
Oh, unable to send a will :(
Good Job! Such a persistent man
